snippet: The director Shohei Imamura’s period of documentarylike films yielded some never shown in the United States. Now they’re being screened at Anthology Film Archives.
abstract: Documentary films made by Japanese director Shohei Imamura between 1967 and 1975 will be given their American theatrical premieres in a retrospective at Anthology Film Archives.
lead_paragraph: The director Shohei Imamura’s period of documentarylike films yielded some never shown in the United States. Now they’re being screened at Anthology Film Archives.

headline.seo: Shohei Imamura’s Documentaries at Anthology Film Archives
headline.main: Looking Beyond Documentary to Face Truths
headline.print_headline: Looking Beyond Documentary to Face Truths
